parameters.name: HorizontalScheme
parameters.description: Horizontal dimensioning scheme as defined in swAutodimScheme_e

title: ISketch.AutoDimension2
signature:
System.Int32 AutoDimension2( 
   System.Int32
EntitiesToDimension
,
   System.Int32
HorizontalScheme
,
   System.Int32
HorizontalPlacement
,
   System.Int32
VerticalScheme
,
   System.Int32
VerticalPlacement
)

parameters.name: EntitiesToDimension
parameters.description: Entities to dimension as defined in swAutodimEntities_e

parameters.name: HorizontalScheme
parameters.description: Horizontal dimensioning scheme as defined in swAutodimScheme_e

parameters.name: HorizontalPlacement
parameters.description: Placement relative to the sketch as defined in swAutodimHorizontalPlacement_e

parameters.name: VerticalScheme
parameters.description: Vertical dimensioning scheme as defined in swAutodimScheme_e

parameters.name: VerticalPlacement
parameters.description: Placement relative to the sketch as defined in swAutodimVerticalPlacement_e

returns: swAutodimStatusSuccess if the sketch is automatically dimensioned successfully; see swAutodimStatus_e for values for reasons for possible failures
remarks:
If the EntitiesToDimension argument takes the value swAutodimEntitiesSelected, then use
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
with a mark value of swAutodimMarkEntities to select the sketch entities to dimension.
You can supply datums for horizontal and vertical dimensioning schemes. Select and mark a unique vertical edge, vertex, sketch point, or vertical sketch line as the datum for the horizontal dimensioning scheme, using swAutodimMarkHorizontalDatum as the mark value. Similarly, select a unique horizontal edge, vertex, sketch point, or horizontal sketch line as the datum for the vertical dimensioning scheme, using swAutodimMarkVerticalDatum as the mark value. It is an error to supply just one datum as indicated by the status value swAutodimStatus_DatumNotSupplied.
